name: for the love of texture afghan
sizes_available: 45" x 53", but instructions are provided to customize the size of your blanket. the pdf pattern also has instructions for 9 other blanket sizes (baby to california king).
notes:
crochet this cozy for the love of texture blanket to snuggle up in on cold days! this blanket is designed to be an heirloom piece that will be loved (and used) for years to come. if you're looking for a fun, textured blanket to hold your interest as you crochet, this is the perfect project for you. it is made using the single crochet, half double crochet, and puff stitch to create tons of texture.

stitches: single, half double, crossed half double, and puff stitch

available sizes: 10 blanket sizes included in the pdf (stroller, baby, lapghan, small, and medium throw, twin, full, queen king, and california king)

how much yarn is needed? the pdf pattern includes the number of yards needed for each of the 10 blanket sizes for a single colour and tri-colour option.

colour options: instructions are included to make this blanket in a single colour or with 4 colours! a colour chart is provided.

yarn: worsted / aran weight yarn

other details:

* progress pictures and video tutorials are included for each stitch.
* the printable pdf is a total of 18 pages.
* there are 2 pdfs included - one written in us crochet terminology, and one written in uk crochet terminology.
* instructions are included for customizing the size of your blanket.
* pattern has been tech edited and tested!
* if you have any questions as you go through the pattern, please don't hesitate to ask! i'd be more than happy to help you.
